title: Describing an Association: Linear vs. Non-Linear
question_text: Looking at the scatterplot below, which of the following describes the nature of the association? Created for Albert.io. Copyright 2017. All rights reserved.

choices.text: There is a strong negative linear association between x x and y y .
There is a strong positive linear association between x x and y y .
There is a strong negative non-linear association between x x and y y .
There is a strong positive non-linear association between x x and y y .
There is a weak positive non-linear association between x x and y y .
